lines.text: I told you I'd get him in range!
Yes, but Superman's not finished yet, Prankster.
Leave him to me, Luthor, I'll make him come back.
Great Ceasar's Ghost, Kent, another rocket base destroyed!
Yes, chief, first the Far East, now the Middle East.
It seems we have visitors from space. Okay, I'll be a one-man welcoming committee.
The ocean liner, I think it's ready for a cruise - on LAND!
[The Warlock's magic ruby beams the ship down Metropolis' Main Street]
Gosh, Mr. White, an ocean liner on Main Street?
What have you done now, Luthor?
Olsen activated my lighting conditioner, automatically locking the door!

As the Man Of Steel fights his way to Lois Lane in the troubled sub, time is indeed running out for the two men trapped in the vault. Can Superman rescue Lois, and return in time to save Perry White? Don't miss the exciting conclusion, coming up next!
